Title: Data Scientist (m/f/d)
Description:
Why roadsurfer?


TEAM SPIRIT & TEAM EVENTS: Look forward to a collegial atmosphere with flat hierarchies, lots of fun and great team spirit, as well as regular team events such as joint sports sessions, pizza & beer evenings, etc.
FLEX WORK & WORKATION: You are flexible in terms of working hours. Our Flex Work Policy enables you to switch between office days and home office days and work from abroad in Europe for one month per year
PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT: We support your personal and professional development through an individual Growth Plan and our Inhouse Academy
CAMPER BUDGET: You get an annual camper budget to experience the #happyroadsurfing lifestyle for yourself
DISCOUNTS: Use our Corporate Benefits Platform, the Travel Industry Card and Family & Friends Discounts


Our Data team


Our strategic leader, who is responsible for aligning the company's strategies with our team's priorities through her knowledge and vision of the business.
The technical data leader, responsible for sizing the team, defining work dynamics to improve deliveries, looking after the career development of team members and defining data project roadmaps.
Data engineers, who help us integrate any new source into our Data Lake and structure our Data Warehouse.
Analytics engineers, who master our PowerBI dashboards, grow our Data Warehouse with data quality, applying all the business logic to our raw data.
Web Data Analysts, who focus on front-end analysis and empower marketing and product teams with data, creating the entire structure that allows us to track and understand user behaviour.
Data analysts, responsible for transforming the company's data and metrics into valuable insights and business knowledge to improve performance and drive strategic actions and decisions.


The role - your passion


Developing and Implementing Predictive Models and Algorithms::
Design and develop advanced machine learning models for forecasting demand, pricing optimization, and other key business functions.
Implement models using Python and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
Ensure model accuracy and performance through rigorous validation and testing.
Data Preparation and Analysis:
Utilize data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib) to present findings effectively.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to uncover patterns, correlations, and insights that inform business decisions.
Collaboration and Stakeholder Engagement:
Work closely with business stakeholders to understand their data needs and translate them into technical requirements.
Provide actionable insights and recommendations through clear and concise communication of complex data engineering results.
Guide stakeholders in implementing data-driven strategies and solutions.
Supporting Team Members:
Conduct peer reviews of code and data engineering approaches to ensure best practices and knowledge sharing.
Mentor junior data engineers and analysts, providing guidance on technical challenges and career development.
Fostering a Data-Driven Culture:
Develop and deliver training sessions on data engineering topics, tools, and best practices to enhance data literacy across the organization.
Promote the use of modern data engineering tools and methodologies in decision-making processes through workshops, seminars, and other educational activities.lf-sufficient in getting the answer to their business questions by themselves

What You Need To Surf The Wave With Us


Educational Background:
You have successfully completed a bachelorâ€™s degree, preferably in engineering, physics, informatics, computer science, or other STEM-related areas.
Professional Experience:
You have several years of relevant experience as a data scientist, with a strong focus on business and operational analytics.
You have a proven track record of developing and deploying predictive models and algorithms in a business context.
Technical Skills:
You have advanced proficiency in SQL for data extraction and manipulation.
You are skilled in using data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar platforms.
You have extensive experience with programming languages such as Python or R, and are proficient in machine learning libraries (Scikit-Learn, XGBoost, Keras o Tensorflow).
Analytical and Decision-Making Abilities:
You are adept at making data-driven decisions and guiding stakeholders to achieve optimal strategies based on actionable insights.
You possess strong problem-solving skills and the ability to translate complex data engineering challenges into clear, actionable solutions.
Communication Skills:
You are business fluent in English, both written and verbal.
You can effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and collaborate with diverse teams.

ABOUT #ROADSURFER

As a #roadsurfer you are part of an open, fast-growing team with ambitious goals and a great team spirit. We stick together and combine a brutal hands-on mentality with fun at work! It means shaping the future of outdoor travel and building an ecosystem for sustainable outdoor travel. We are more than Europe's largest campervan rental company. In 2021 we launched our platform roadsurfer spots in addition to our other products rent, abo and sales â€“ a platform where you can discover and book unique camping spots. But thatâ€™s only the beginning. We are growing fast, so hop on board and join us on our journey. Weâ€™re looking for motivated and passionate people whose hearts beat for campers. Wanna spread the roadsurfer spirit across the globe with us?

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Why Talan?

Talan is an international advisory group on innovation and transformation through technology, with 5000 employees, and a turnover of 600Mâ‚¬.




We offer our customers a continuum of services to support you at each key stage of your organization's transformation, with 4 main activities:




- CONSULTING in management and innovation : supporting business, managerial, cultural, and technological transformations.

- DATA & TECHNOLOGY to implement major transformation projects.

- CLOUD & APPLICATION SERVICES to build or integrate software solutions.

- SERVICE CENTERS of EXCELLENCE to support the latter through technology, innovation, agility, sustainability of skills and cost optimization.




Talan accelerates it's clients' transformation through innovation and technology. By understanding their challenges, with our support, innovation, technology and data, we enable them to be more efficient and resilient.




We believe that only a human oriented-practice of technology will make the new digital age an era of progress for all. Together let's commit!




WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

Our international team is currently seeking for a Experienced Data Scientist with good level experience working closely with missions related to contribute to the transformation and continuous evolution of the platforms that supports big company units' Regulatory and Controls (RAC) domain.




You will be part of an international technical unit of a globally recognized bank, and your team will be multicultural so having a good command of English as a common language would be essential.




Your profile will be essential here as you will be part of:

- Proposing software designs for applications or components applying agreed standards, patterns and tools. Ability to understand complex architectures with a wide range of technologies which need to talk each other.

- Disposition to do what it takes to ensure the team accomplishes its goals.

- Contributes towards technical requirements of all the products/features.

- Among others!

If you consider yourself a strong profile and you are eager to continue your career in this type of sector, this is for you!




Essential Skills & Knowledge:

Knowledge around Cloud Computing environments.
Knowledge of the principles of machine learning and MLOps
Demonstrated experience with SQL, R or a comparable programming language (such as Python, SAS, SPSS, or MATLAB)
Agile methodologies and tools: Jira, Confluence, GIT.
2+ years of experience in Data Science business, developing end-to-end data solutions
Fluent in Spanish and English.
Strong quantitative and problem-solving skills with focus hypothesis formulation and testing.
Strong evidence of leveraging analytics to drive business results.
Exceptional working ethics, critical thinking skills and attention to details.
Ability to work both autonomously and together with a multi-skilled distributed team.
Strategical thinking, Innovative attitude to challenge status quo
Great written and verbal communication skills dealing with highly technical subjects.

It will be definitely a plus counting with:

Familiarity with Model Risk Management concept is a plus!
Familiarity with Corporate & Investment Banking Business or Payments is a plus
Familiarity with Anti Money Laundering is a plus
Demonstrated ability to communicate complex concepts.




What do we offer you?

Permanent and full-time contract. We are looking for committed people looking for a workplace to stay and grow.
Mostly all day working from home and always looking for the most flexible work model. Team buildings will take place at the office or public places.
Smart Office Pack so that you can work comfortably from home.
Fast pace of growth in the company.
Development of your Career Path and continues improvement.
Benefits and perks such as private medical insurance, life insurance, lunch and travel cards as part of the flexible remuneration package, among others.
Possibility to be part of a multicultural team and work on international projects with a great impact.
Possibility to get the Working permit and European residence for non-European candidates.




If you have read this far and you are looking forward to joining this challenge, do not hesitate to apply... we would be delighted to meet you! Lets have a call together!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Be part of something revolutionary

At o9 Solutions, our mission is clear: be the Most Valuable Platform (MVP) for enterprises. With our AI-driven platform â€” the o9 Digital Brain â€” we integrate global enterprisesâ€™ siloed planning capabilities, helping them capture millions and, in some cases, billions of dollars in value leakage. But our impact doesnâ€™t stop there. Businesses that plan better and faster also reduce waste, which drives better outcomes for the planet, too.

We're on the lookout for the brightest, most committed individuals to join us on our mission. Along the journey, weâ€™ll provide you with a nurturing environment where you can be part of something truly extraordinary and make a real difference for companies and the planet.

About the role

o9 Solutions is looking for an experienced, talented, and motivated Lead Data Scientist to come join our global team in NA or EMEA. As part of this Data Science team, you will be involved in the end-to-end delivery of our supply chain planning products and building advanced forecasting models with Predictive Analytics, Machine Learning and AI with algorithms such as R, and Python. These models will have used cases for Demand Planning, Supply Planning, Market Mix Modeling, Price Elasticity, New Product Planning, Store Assortment, Market Optimization, and more!

You will be key in understanding the customers supply chain problems, designing solutions, developing, and deploying models, validating, and maintaining those models.

A successful candidate will bring a Masterâ€™s in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Engineering, and 5+ years of experience in hands-on modeling in R or Python, in a supply chain forecasting capacity. You will enjoy working directly with customers and our larger o9 Data Science team in India and NA.

What youâ€™ll do for us:

Research, design, build, deploy, and validate new and existing machine learning models and predictive analytics for advanced forecasting in supply chain demand planning that will drive our customers growth from insights that are allow for better decision making
Apply a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, regression, neural nets, time series, optimizations etc.) to their real-world advantages/drawbacks for insights internally and externally
Collaborate with solution architects, business operations specialists, engineers, data scientists, product managers, and internal/external business teams to make sure the models are aligned with business objectives and customer needs
Develop machine learning models for segmentation and optimization
Provide visualization of complex data sets that includes mathematical models, algorithms, and robust analytics
Produce recommendations and use statistical techniques that answer key product questions
Provide on-going support for development of demand planning forecasting and predictive analysis.
Be a storyteller to explain the â€œwhy and howâ€™â€ of your data driven recommendations to cross-functional teams and customers
Guide junior data scientists and oversee their activities to ensure proper alignment/execution of their activities, and maintain high coding standards and best practices within organization

What youâ€™ll bring:

Experience: 5+ years of data science and data analytics experience.
5+ yearsâ€™ experience in supply chain planning analysis that specialize in: Demand Planning, Predictive Analysis, Demand Forecasting, Supply Planning, Inventory Market Optimization, Store Segmentation, Market Mix Optimization, New Product Planning, or similar.
Experience in building scalable ML frameworks for demand sensing including identifying and collecting relevant input data, feature engineering, tuning, and testing.
Experience developing experimental and analytics plans for data modeling processes with the ability to accurately determine and resolve problems
Experience gathering data requirements for statistical predictive analytics research that drives market research, product innovation, and implementation in a supply chain space
Strong presentation and communications skills with ability to communicate complex analytical or technical concepts to audiences with limited analytical or technical background
Experience in time series forecasting in scale using heuristic based hierarchical best-fit models using algorithms like exponential smoothing, ARIMA, prophet and custom parameter tuning
Education: Masterâ€™s in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Engineering, or related field
Skills: R, Python, Pyspark, Machine Learning, SQL, building models in platforms like Power BI or Tableau
Characteristics: You thrive in a fast paced, challenging environment, where this is much white space and problem solving is at the heart of what drives your analysis
We really value team spirit: Transparency and frequent communication is key. At o9, this is not limited by hierarchy, distance, or function

Preferred Experienceâ€¦

Exposure to distributed data/computing tools: Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Gurobi, or related Big Data technologies
Experience with Deep Learning frameworks such as Keras, Tensorflow or PyTorch is preferable
Experience in implementing planning applications will be a plus

How the process worksâ€¦

Apply by clicking the button below.
Youâ€™ll be contacted by our recruiter, whoâ€™ll fill you in on all things o9, give you some background about the role and get to know you. Theyâ€™ll contact you either via video call or phone call - whatever you prefer.
During the interview phase, you will meet with the Hiring Manager for 30 minutes. The recruiter will contact you after the interview to let you know if weâ€™d like to progress your application.
Your application has progressed! Meet with a new panel for a final round of interviews for 30 minutes each.
Our recruiter will let you know if youâ€™re the successful candidate. Good luck!

More about usâ€¦

With the latest increase in our valuation from $1.1B to $3.7B, o9 Solutions is one of the fastest-growing technology companies in the world today. Our mission is to digitally transform planning and decision-making for the enterprise and the planet. Our culture is high-energy and drives us to aim 10x in everything we do.

Our platform, the o9 Digital Brain, is the premier AI-powered, cloud-native platform driving the digital transformations of major global enterprises including Google, Walmart, ABInBev, Starbucks, and many others.

Our headquarters are located in Dallas, with offices in Amsterdam, Paris, London, Barcelona, Madrid, Milan, Munich, Bangalore, Tokyo, Seoul, Sydney, Sao Paulo and Toronto.

o9 is an equal opportunity employer and seeks applicants of diverse backgrounds and hires without regard to race, colour, gender, religion, national origin, citizenship, age, sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by law

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Digital Business team works to develop the most promising digital solutions for the global products and process and to organize Applus+ Laboratories information and provide a useful, fast and reliable way to exploit it by Applus+ Group and our clients, being recognized as the most digital, innovative and customer-oriented company, reducing the cost of the digital operations and increasing the value and the portfolio of the services.




We are looking for one ML / AI engineer to join our Digital team and help develop constantly evolving data products and applications.




What are we are looking for?

To succeed at this job, you will need to collect information, organize it, generate code, train, verify, validate, analyze data, and draw conclusions.
Itâ€™s expected to have strong fundamentals in mathematics and be familiar with a wide range of numerical & statistical methods as well as different machine learning algorithms. NLP and foundation models experience is desired plus in-deep specific knowledge on Transformers, Tokenization and Encoding-Decoding processes. Explainable AI methodology and related python libraries usage is welcome.
Itâ€™s also expected to be organized in thinking, showing a strong sense of logic and reasoning. It will be necessary to freeze reasoning processes through documentation and comments in the code, so communication skills and knowledge-sharing methods are necessary.
Having an orientation to detail is must, being able to spot anomalies in data and code with ease; furthermore, as AI engineer, out-of-the-box thinking is watched for.




Requirements:

Demonstrated experience coding in python specifically working in data science projects and using ML most common libraries.
2+ year experience in ML / AI projects.
Strong knowledge in machine learning / deep learning fundamentals and techniques.
Specific knowledge on Computer Linguistics may be an advantage: NLP libraries like Spacy or NLTK, genAI frameworks such as LangChain and/or LlamaIndex, chunking, tokenization, embeddings...
Specific expertness on foundation models will be considered.
Previous experiences working with GenerativeAI and explainableAI are welcome.




Education

Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, mathematics applied to computer science or similar.
Specific Master Degree in Data Science or AI engineering is an advantage.




Languages

Fluent in Spanish and English.




Benefits

Chance to work in a dynamic and challenging environment where you will be able to reach your full potential.
Constant learning and knowledge sharing with some of the most experienced engineers in the automotive industry.
Hybrid position.
Career progression.
We promote the training and constant learning, and we offer paid specialized training and subsidized language courses.
Subsidized canteen.




If you love NNs, have passion for the most complex AI algorithms and like to challenge yourself, this is the right job for you!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Are you a Data Scientist, looking for your next challenge?




Do you want to work for a Global company, present in 50+ countries & take your career to the next level?




If yes, read on!




Responsibilities:




Utilize data-driven insights for strategic decision-making and business growth.
Apply statistical analysis, machine learning, and predictive modeling techniques.
Provide technical expertise to ensure efficient implementation of solutions.
Develop algorithms to optimize processes and drive innovation.
Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and solve business challenges.
Work with Data Ambassadors and CoE to manage project scope and requirements.
Lead data integration projects and enhance model performance through testing.




Role Requirements:




2+ years' experience in Data Science or similar roles.
Proficiency in Python, R, or Scala, with data analysis libraries.
Strong grasp of statistical concepts and machine learning algorithms.
Experience with Power BI, matplotlib, and SQL.
Agile development and Agile methodologies understanding.
Knowledge of DAMA Capabilities and Data Management disciplines.
Design and implement scalable AI solutions.
Understanding of data management and integration concepts.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Track record of delivering impactful data science solutions.




*Must speak fluent English*

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Centric Pricingâ„¢ (formerly StyleSage), is an AI driven competitive assortment benchmarking and market trend insights solution for fashion, beauty and home goods brands and retailers.

We are a key innovation partner for iconic and emerging brands across the world.

Our Platform is able to analyze the info of more than 1.000 retailers, processing data from more than 600.000 brands, tracking millions of products!

The Data Science team is responsible for enriching the data that our crawlers collect massively from fashion related websites with our own machine learning models. Our models add information to the existing products such as the categories (clothing, footwear, beautyâ€¦), genders, attributes, colors, bounding boxes, etc. The database already contains more than 500 millions of products (growing daily) and we process 1-2M new products every week.

To do that, you will use the latest and best open-source technologies out there. We code in Python (and we love it, you may want to come to the PyCon Spain conference with us!), using Keras as our main Deep Learning framework (although we are starting using Pytorch for certain projects) along with the other machine learning and computer vision libraries like scikit-learn or OpenCV.

In the engineering side, we use Django as our main framework for accessing the data. We are a cloud-native company, so our code runs in AWS. Our massive amount of data lives in PostgreSQL databases and we keep an eye on all this using observability tools like Grafana, Influxdb and Telegraf.

If you do not know a lot about some of those technologies, worry not, our engineers will be happy to support you while you are on your journey to becoming an expert in them.

Your Job

Responsibilities

As a data scientist you will be responsible of ensuring that our current data science pipelines run smoothly over time with the best performance, as well as developing new machine learning pipelines and algorithms by:


Creating datasets from our huge data lake of products and social media data, selecting the most relevant items for your use case and ensuring the data quality
Hands-on train, deploy, productionize and operate Machine Learning models and pipelines at scale, including both batch and real-time use cases.
Contribute to expanding and improving the infrastructure to support all stages of the machine learning model lifecycle, including feature engineering, feature store, model training, testing, monitoring, and deployment in a production environment.
Proactively identify, and implement internal process improvements including automating manual work, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability.
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our ML capabilities remain competitive and cutting-edge.
Onboard and enable Data Scientists with different levels of engineering expertise



Your Skills


3+ years of experience working as a software engineer.
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field
3+ years of experience as a production level Python developer and Deep learning frameworks: Tensorflow, Keras or Pytorch
Machine learning and Python data libraries like scikit-learn, pandas or numpy
Experience with Computer Vision
Experience with SQL databases: preferably PostgreSQL
Django ORM
Linux shell command line.
Version Control in a collaborative environment with Git
Strong communication skills (written and oral) in English



Bonus Points

Additionally, it would be nice if you are familiar with:


Image processing libraries like OpenCV or Pillow
MLOps frameworks like MLFlow
Docker
NLP processing libraries such as Spacy or NLTK
Asynchronous processes with RabbitMQ and Celery
System monitoring with InfluxDB, Grafana
Working knowledge of containers (Docker)
Experience working with cloud based infrastructures (AWS, Azureâ€¦)



Centric Software provides equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants without regard to race, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, color, age, religion, protected veteran or disability status or genetic information.

Title: AI Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
As a trusted global transformation partner, Welocalize accelerates the global business journey by enabling brands and companies to reach, engage, and grow international audiences. Welocalize delivers multilingual content transformation services in translation, localization, and adaptation for over 250 languages with a growing network of over 400,000 in-country linguistic resources. Driving innovation in language services, Welocalize delivers high-quality training data transformation solutions for NLP-enabled machine learning by blending technology and human intelligence to collect, annotate, and evaluate all content types. Our team works across locations in North America, Europe, and Asia serving our global clients in the markets that matter to them. www.welocalize.com

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

MAIN PURPOSE OF ROLE

The Machine Learning Engineer role is responsible for the design, development, and implementation of data-driven solutions to serve our organization. This includes ownership or oversight of projects from conception to delivery with a focus on advanced analytics, statistical modeling, and data visualization. The role also includes responsibility for following best practices to optimize and measure the performance of our models and algorithms against business goals.

MAIN DUTIES


The following is a non-exhaustive list of responsibilities and areas of ownership of the Machine Learning Engineer:
Design and develop machine learning models and algorithms for various aspects of the localization and business workflow processes, including machine translation, LLM finetuning, and quality assurance
Take ownership of key projects from definition to delivery, ensuring that they meet technical requirements and maintain momentum and direction until delivery
Evaluate and select appropriate machine-learning techniques and algorithms to solve specific problems
Implement and optimize machine learning models and technologies using Python, TensorFlow, and other relevant tools and frameworks
Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results
Keep abreast of developments in the field, with a dedication to learning in the role
Document diligently and communicate thoughtfully about ML experimentation, design, and deployment
Define and design solutions to machine learning problems. Integration with larger systems done with guidance of more senior team members
Communicate with stakeholders and present findings in a clear manner
Propose solutions and strategies to tackle business challenges


Requirements


Education
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Machine Learning, Data Science or similar discipline (or equivalent experience)
Technical Skills and Experience
3+ years experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role
Highly proficient in Python
Excellent communication and documentation skills
Strong knowledge of machine learning techniques and algorithms, including supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and reinforcement learning
Hands-on, high proficiency experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn
Strong background and proven experience in natural language processing (NLP)
Analytical mind and business acumen
Experience with data visualization tools like matplotlib, bokeh, d3.js
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
Experience taking ownership of projects from conception to deployment, and mentoring more junior team members


Welocalize is committed to equal opportunities and in compliance with the General Law on the Rights of People with Disabilities, this vacancy is also available and we encourage those candidates who have a disability certificate (equal to or greater than 33%) to apply.

Title: AI Data Scientist
Description:
At Tenth Revolution, we collaborate with a leading global multinational company in their sector.

We attract, develop, and grow passionate individuals who will significantly impact the digital future of our partners. Join us and be a part of our digital transformation journey.




Objective of the Position




We are looking for a talented Data Scientist specializing in Generative AI to develop a GenAI-driven application that enhances decision-making processes.




In this role, you will:

Engage in discussions about data analytics, AI, and Generative AI features with users, converting business requirements into technical concepts for Generative AI and ML engineering.
Utilize deep knowledge of data engineering to relate data to user decision-making situations.
Plan user experiences and guide data engineers and scientists to fully embrace these experiences.
Collaborate with global and regional units, as well as external partners.
Assist in the transition from project phases to successful operations, incorporating Generative AI features.




Main Tasks

Work closely with project team members and stakeholders to understand the background and business requirements of each party and provide consulting on their activities.
Translate business requirements into technical concepts, focusing on data science and ML engineering within GenAI architecture frameworks.
Data preparation
Utilizing enterprise data product concepts
Addressing data science aspects
Implementing high-performance GenAI functionalities
Create and maintain product requirement documents in an agile working environment, using tools such as Azure DevOps boards and tasks.
Operate in an international and agile DevOps environment, applying agile principles to set priorities and manage multiple stakeholders in a dynamic business setting.
Share knowledge and expertise with colleagues, promoting a culture of AI-driven innovation within the organization.
Manage communication with external vendors to validate landscape design and integration concepts.




Job Requirements




Technical & Professional Knowledge (Mandatory):




At least 4 years of experience in data science or AI, utilizing Microsoft Azure cloud components for ML and Data Science, such as Databricks and Azure Data Factory.
Experience integrating external data into MLOps frameworks.
Hands-on experience developing GenAI-based chatbots.
Experience working with large data sets, relational databases, data integration, and related technologies (e.g., SQL, Databricks).
Expert knowledge of Python, focusing on machine learning and data science libraries (e.g., Pandas, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Hands-on experience with MLOps processes (CI/CD) and automating ML workflows (Microsoft Azure or other platforms).
Experience with software development for cloud-based applications in an agile setup (e.g., Kanban, Scrum).
Strong interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills in English.




Technical & Professional Knowledge (Additional Plus/Nice to Have):

Proven track record of successful AI-driven projects, preferably in an industrial setting.
Experience with GenAI technology
Experience in supply chain management or planning.




Conditions

Location: Hybrid
Salary: 55,000- 65,000â‚¬ + 10% Bonus + Benefits + 30 Vacation Days + Flexible hours
Languages: English C1

Title: Data Scientist - Risk Team
Description:
Thanks to our innovative BuyNow PayLater payment solution, Scalapay is transforming the way more than 5 million customers buy online and in-store, empowering 8,000+ merchants (online and in-store) to give their customers magical shopping experiences.

Being only 3 years old didnâ€™t stop us from becoming a unicorn ğŸ¦„ We have raised over $700mln and we did this thanks to a team built around our 4 core values: #MakeItHappen #PlayAsATeam #StayCurious #FocusOnCustomer.

This is where your magic happens. If you love it, Scalapay it â™¥

Are you passionate about leveraging data to drive informed decision-making and ensure the sustainable growth of a dynamic company? Join us as a Risk Data Scientist and contribute to shaping the core strategy of our business - the risk management.

You will be responsible for:


Develop, fine-tune, and deploy predictive algorithms using cutting-edge machine learning techniques and optimization models.
Work closely with our Risk decision analysts to create automated solutions that detect and mitigate emerging fraudulent trends.
Collaborate with the Product team to design experiments, analyse results, and extract actionable insights to enhance Scalapay's offerings. This will involve statistical modelling, correlation analysis and causal inference to understand behaviours inside the Scalapay product.
Stay ahead of the curve by staying updated on the latest technologies and industry trends.


Youâ€™ll be great for this role if:


You have at least 5 years of experience as a Data Scientist
Deep theoretical and applied knowledge in traditional machine learning, as well as knowledge in statistical inference, time series analysis and forecasting, or mathematical optimisation.
Extensive experience with the end-to-end model development cycle. Familiarity with orchestration tools and cloud infrastructures.
Excellent coding skills (SQL, Python/R)
Strong problem-solving abilities, with a knack for translating business challenges into data-driven hypotheses.
The ability to own and manage the entire data pipeline for your projects proactively.
Adaptability and change management skills to thrive in a fast-paced environment.
Exceptional communication skills in English, both written and verbal, to effectively convey complex ideas to diverse audiences.


Bonus Points for:


An advanced degree (MSc or PhD) in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Operations Research, or related fields.
Experience in start-up environments, or in the Risk/Fraud domain.


Why you should join Scalapay:


Attractive packages based on skills and experience - the salary band we have for this position is of 60'000-70'000 â‚¬ (Gross Annual Salary)
International environment with significant challenges to be met every day
Lots of opportunities to work with a team of industry tech leaders who are focused on delivering products that offer exceptional user experiences
Personalised support to accelerate your professional growth and take ownership of the products you deliver: we want to help you grow!
Latest technologies and being encouraged to bring your flair to the role.


Recruitment Process:


A quick chat with one of our Talent Acquisition team members
The first interview with the Hiring Manager to dive deep into your experiences and better understand your motivation
A case study to test your hard skills
A final chat with Simone, our CEO


Want to learn more? Don't hesitate to explore our Careers website , our LinkedIn and Glassdoor pages.

Pro tip: send your CV in English ğŸ˜‰

Super Pro tip: we know that application processes can be scary and frustrating butâ€¦ we look for talent, not people that tick all our boxes.

We believe in the power of diversity: Scalapay is an Equal Opportunity Employer for any minority, disability, gender identity or sexual orientation.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Job Description

- Obtaining data and improving its quality through ETL.

- Productivization of models in heterogeneous environments (APIs, pipelines, automations, chatbots...).

- Python and Spark code optimization.

- Cloud tasks (Azure and AWS).

- Linux machine administration.

Â 

Experience:

Â 

- Experience in administration of Linux environments.

- Knowledge of Cloud services (Azure and AWS).

- Knowledge of supervised (regressions, random forest, SVM, etc.) and unsupervised (PCA, clustering, etc.) Machine Learning models.

- High knowledge of Python and/or Java.

- Experience with API development.

- Experience in orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
We are offering a Data Scientist - AdExchange position, to build the global contextual advertising leader.




WHO WE ARE

Seedtag is the leading Contextual Advertising Platform. Our proprietary, machine learning-based technology provides a human-like understanding of the content on the web, the highest level of brand safety in the industry and unmatched cookieless targeting capabilities.

We engage with the market on both demand and supply sides to create, activate and launch high-quality advertising campaigns at scale. We are committed to creating a more beautiful, respectful and engaging way to do advertising.




KEY FIGURES

2014 Â· Founded by two ex-Googlers

2021 Â· Fundraising round of 40Mâ‚¬ & +10 countries & +230 Seedtaggers

2022 Â· Fundraising round of 250Mâ‚¬ + expansion into the U.S market

2023 Â· Expansion into 15 countries + 500 Seedtaggers







YOUR CHALLENGE

The AdExchange is the space where supply opportunities (ad slots) are matched to advertising demand items (ads). Just like the former trading pits in the stock market, opportunities to sell and buy are constantly created and resolved.

To make the most of this flow of monetization opportunities, we develop, train and deploy different Machine Learning models. At our AdExhange, you will find a myriad of use cases, each requiring different mathematical and infrastructure solutions. Our approach is strongly product-oriented, with a firm mathematical basis and proficient software development practices.

You will work close to the production environment and hand-to-hand with the teamâ€™s Data Scientists, MLOps and Data engineers, getting immediate feedback on the response of your solution. From your head to the cluster, you will have a barrier-free highway and a proactive team around you to support your work and ideas.




This is a high-impact project that will shape the future of Seedtag
You will work on identifying, exploring, and making sense of data sources
You will partner closely with the Data component of our squad, to enhance the delivery of the intelligence into the AdExchange
You will develop machine learning solutions to solve business problems: anomaly detection, price optimization, etc.
You will develop and deploy production-oriented data software




YOU WILL SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE IF

You have 2-4 years of solid experience in data science and machine learning
You (preferentially) have a degree in computer science, engineering, statistics, mathematics, physics or another degree with a strong quantitative component.
You understand the theoretical functioning of the main algorithms in ML and you have experience applying these to real problems
You have ample experience with one or more of these machine learning tools: Scikit-learn, Tensorflow, PyTorch, etc.
You have a strong understanding of the technical and business requirements of the projects you work on, and you can think strategically to ensure that your work aligns with the goals of the company.
You are energized by tackling complex technical problems and figuring out creative solutions.
You are committed to staying up-to-date with the latest developments in back-end engineering and are always looking for ways to improve your skills and knowledge.
You are comfortable working collaboratively with others, and you are able to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
You are comfortable working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, and you are able to adjust to changing priorities and requirements.




SEEDTAG PERKS

Key moment to join Seedtag in terms of growth and opportunities
High-performance tier salary bands excellent compensation
One Seedtag: Work for a month from any of our open offices with travel and stay paid if youâ€™re a top performer (think of Brazil, Mexico...)
Real flexible schedule to balance work and personal life
A harassment-free, supportive and safe environment to ensure the healthiest and friendliest professional experience fostering diversity at all levels
Optional company-paid English, French and/or Spanish courses
Access to learning opportunities (learning & development budget) and Odilo online academy, where you can learn as much as you want
We love what we do, but we also love having fun. We have many team activities you can join and enjoy with your colleagues! A Yearly offsite with all the company, team offsites, and Holiday eventsâ€¦




BENEFITS OF WORKING AT SEEDTAG

Growth: International, highly demanding work environment in one of the fastest growing AdTech companies in Europe. We reject "thatâ€™s the way itâ€™s always been done". In Seedtag you can find an energetic, fresh workplace, multicultural work environment where our members are from different countries in Europe, LATAM, the US and so many more!
Impact: The chance to have a direct impact, here you don't work for the sake of working, we all have an impact on Seedtag in our own way, rowing in the same direction
Diversity of methodology and people: Seedtag DNA is unique and highly appreciated by very different types of Seedtagers. We embrace diversity and encourage everyone to seek the best version of themselves and to show who they really are. With a totally flexible methodology
Flexibility: At Seedtag, we trust you, you can work from home, the beach or the office in our hybrid mode




Are you ready to join the Seedtag adventure? Then send us your CV!

â— Entorno hÃ­brido donde podrÃ¡s organizar tus horarios como quieras: TendrÃ¡s flexibilidad para organizar tu dÃ­a a dÃ­a, conciliando asÃ­ tu vida laboral y personal. TrabajarÃ¡s en un entorno hÃ­brido porque nos encanta tambiÃ©n ir a la oficina: compartimos desayuno, conectamos y solucionamos mÃ¡s cosas. No solo trabajas, tambiÃ©n haces equipo.

â— Cada dÃ­a aprenderÃ¡s algo nuevo y te enfrentarÃ¡s a retos diferentes: Estamos creciendo muy rÃ¡pido y tenemos que adaptarnos y dar soluciÃ³n a las nuevas situaciones que van surgiendo, lo que te ayudarÃ¡ a crecer tanto personal como profesionalmente.

â— Sector en auge donde verÃ¡s el impacto de tu trabajo en el dÃ­a a dÃ­a: El agua va a ser un bien cada vez mÃ¡s escaso y ayudamos a que su gestiÃ³n sea lo mÃ¡s eficiente posible, aportando tu granito de arena a la mejora del medio ambiente.


AdemÃ¡s de estos beneficios, podrÃ¡s disfrutar de muchos otros:

Como eventos de teambuilding, plataformas de formaciÃ³n, catering subvencionado al 50% o de la plataforma iFeel, entre otros, con el objetivo de que tu dÃ­a a dÃ­a en Idrica sea mucho mejor.


Por lo que, si te incorporas al equipo, algunas de tus funciones serÃ¡n:

â— Desarrollo de nuevos algoritmos en el sector del agua.

â— ParticipaciÃ³n en proyectos piloto

â— Desarrollo de producto,

â— Soporte y mantenimiento de producto

â— Trabajo con series temporales.


Â¿QuÃ© te harÃ¡ triunfar en esta posiciÃ³n?

â— Tener la suficiente experiencia como para ser autÃ³nomo en tu dÃ­a a dÃ­a.

â— Poder mantener una conversaciÃ³n fluida en inglÃ©s, ya que trabajarÃ¡s con equipos de diferentes paÃ­ses y tanto las reuniones como la comunicaciÃ³n escrita puede ser en inglÃ©s.

â— Grado o IngenierÃ­a

â— Python (pandas, scikit-learn, psycopg2, plotly), Spark, SQL

â— Experiencia en:

- IngenierÃ­a de datos

- AnÃ¡lisis de datos

- Machine learning, especialmente time series y deteccion de eventos poco frequentes.

â— Deseables:

- Linux

- Acostumbrado a trabajar en distintos proyectos en paralelo.


AsÃ­ que, si quieres causar un impacto en el mundo, hacerlo de la mano de un equipo que te ayudarÃ¡ en lo que necesites y en una empresa donde las oportunidades de crecimiento son reales,


Â¡Idrica es tu sitio!

Title: Data Science Graduate - Starts in September
Description:
Job description: The Opportunity

Â 

We are looking for a Data Forecaster to join our Advanced Analytics HUB.

Â 

As a Junior Data Analyst focusing on demand forecasting, you will play a key role in analyzing data to predict future product demand and optimize inventory management. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to gather and interpret data, develop forecasting models, and provide actionable insights to enhance decision-making processes.

This position is ideal for a highly analytical individual with a passion for data and a results-oriented mindset. We are looking for someone who embodies our values, is not afraid to challenge, innovate, experiment, and move at a fast pace.

This Graduate position will have a duration of 1 year, with the possibility of joining the company as an employee at the end of the program!

What you'll get to do

Â 

Key Responsibilities:

Collect, clean, and analyze large datasets to support demand forecasting activities
Develop, implement, and maintain demand forecasting models using Python
Interpret data trends and patterns to provide actionable insights for the planning team
Collaborate with various departments, including IT, pricing, marketing, and supply chain, to understand forecasting needs and improve accuracy
Prepare and present detailed reports and visualizations to communicate findings to stakeholders
Continuously monitor and improve forecasting models to ensure their accuracy and reliability
Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in data analysis and demand forecasting
We'd love to meet you if you have

Â 

Required Knowledge:

Bachelorâ€™s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field
Proficiency in Python for data analysis and model development
Experience with common Python libraries and frameworks such as Pandas, Numpy, and Scikit-learn
Proficiency in ExcelÂ 

Required Skills:

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with keen attention to detail
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to convey complex data insights in an understandable manner
Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously

Â 

Valuable Skills and Experience:

Familiarity with additional Python libraries and frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, SAC, Power BI)
Experience with data querying languages (SQL)
Familiarity with SAP or other ERP systems
Knowledge of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud, Azure)

Languages:

Spanish and English: Fluent level is a must; French will be valued

A few things you'll love about us
An entrepreneurial, creative and welcoming work culture
A range of learning and development opportunities
An international company with plenty of opportunities to grow
Company events and well-being initiatives
Hybrid work policy
On onsite gym and restaurant
Flexible work arrangements

Title: Data Scientist (Credit)
Description:
About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, more freedom. And since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. With an arsenal of awesome products that span spending, saving, travel, transfers, investing, exchanging and more, we've helped 40+ million customers get more from their money. And we're not done yet.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth,â€Œ two things are essential to continuing our success: our people and our culture. We've been officially certified as a Great Place to Workâ„¢ in recognition of our outstanding employee experience! So far, we have 10,000+ people working around the world, from our great offices or remotely, on our mission. And we're looking for more. We want brilliant people that love building great products, love redefining success, and love turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

We approach Data Science at Revolut the same way that we approach everything else â€“ with class, logical thinking, and lots of style ğŸ˜ Letâ€™s break it down: we take the most complex problems and create tailor-made solutions for our customers ğŸš€ If youâ€™re thinking the Data team is kept in some sort of a secret den, doomed to never see the impact of their work, donâ€™t worry - thatâ€™s not how we do things. Theyâ€™re some of our best and brightest problem-solvers, deployed to the front lines to work in product teams and deliver rockstar solutions ğŸ¤˜

We start with deep data analysis to understand our customers, their objectives and any issues they might have. We then use various data points and advanced machine learning algorithms, to come up with the best possible option for each client. We experiment, iterate, and build fully automated solutions, based on algorithms which self-improve with time.

Weâ€™re looking for next-level Data Scientists to board our FinTech rocket ship and shape the future of financial services apps. Phew! Itâ€™s a big task, but you wonâ€™t do it alone. ğŸ’ª

Youâ€™ll be working with the toughest and most gifted professionals in Product, Design, Data Science and Engineering, on impactful projects thatâ€™ll make our company move forward â©

What Youâ€™ll Be Doing


Building models for full Retail Credit lifecycle
Improving existing algorithms and building new Proofs of Concept
Delivering real impact to the product through rigorous data-driven solutions
Researching and then delivering PoCs into data products
Collaborating with product owners, engineers, and data scientists to continually solve complex data problems


What You'll Need


Experience working in a data science team of a credit institution
A Bachelor's/Master's/PhD in STEM (Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering)
Excellent knowledge of data science tools, including, python coding, SQL and production tools
A deep understanding of probability and statistics fundamentals
A big-picture mindset to correctly diagnose problems, produce research, and discover solutions
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to partner with Product Owners and business heads


Building a global financial super app isnâ€™t enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and thatâ€™s why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. Weâ€™re doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. Thatâ€™s why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Refer to our <a class="postings-link" href="https://www.revolut.com/legal/data-privacy-for-candidates">Data Privacy Statement for Candidates for details on our data handling practices during your application.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Remerge helps leading mobile app marketers increase revenue and retention by activating, re-engaging and retaining high-value users through programmatic in-app ads. Founded in 2014, Remerge has established itself as a leading app retargeting player globally, with offices spanning Berlin, New York, Singapore, Seoul and Tokyo. Our international team of experts has contributed to the growth of hundreds of apps across all major verticals, including gaming, on-demand delivery, e-commerce, and finance.

Job mission

We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join our team and work on real time bidding systems which make over a billion bids a day. Your team's mission is to model user behaviour, value of the bid, price of the bid and eventually the attribution. Our goal is to automate the advertising strategy, to reach the targets for our clients as a enterprise solution.

About The Team

Our team consists of Machine Learning and Data Science experts from diverse backgrounds and are looking for an additional member for our team with experience in mixed data predictive modelling. In our day-to-day we collaborate with development as well as business teams to build a good bidding system. Joining this team you can expect colleagues that are curious about new models, analytical techniques, different architectures and more, and appreciate spending time together sparring on these ideas.

Job responsibilities


Develop and deploy complex machine learning models in Python and Tensorflow.
Ability to plan and manage different stages of model development (research, development, metrics, real world experiments, deployment)
Be the person of contact for business teams in a region, on client issue and provide solutions / explanations on system behaviour
Be the second line of contact on the models, during on-call alerts.


Job requirements


2-3 years experience working in programatic advertising (DSP, SSP, Ad exchange). Work in retargeting campaigns is a plus.
A good foundation in mathematics of neural networks, loss functions, metrics to analyse performance.
Familiar with Machine learning infrastructure , building models for continuous deployment .
Expertise in building multi modal machine learning models is a plus.
Expertise in dealing with mixed data, models on large data (> 1B records), embedding layers.
Good software engineering skills.
Good communication skills, explaining model behaviour to business teams.


Our promise


Unlimited vacation days - for real. We give you the freedom to figure out the most productive work-life balance for you
Mentorship program for technical and non-technical skills
A truly modern place to work: work from home, from our brand new office in Berlin - your work environment is yours to design. We also offer flexibility in remote work.
Generous remuneration package including virtual shares, a dedicated education budget
End of the year bonus determined by company performance
Travel to our offices around the globe for a short term assignment for up to a month every two years
Comfortable work setup - laptop, phone, screen(s), standing desk etc.
Support for your setup while working from home
Wellness benefits such as sports memberships, Nilo Health subscription and internet reimbursements
Company events including breakfast twice a week, team lunches, birthday and milestone celebrations, quarterly team events and company-wide parties & trips


Remerge is an Equal Opportunity Employer: all qualified applicants are considered for positions regardless of race, ethnic origin, gender, age, religion or belief, marital status, gender identification, sexual orientation, veteran status or disability. We're looking forward to your application!
Show more

Title: MLOps / Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
NTT DATA is the 6th biggest IT Service Company in the world with more than 100.000 professionals and a turnover of more than 15 billion euros.




We at NTT DATA Spain make the difference by being close to our clients, exceeding expectations, managing proactively our projects and customers and focusing on quality and selecting employees with the right mindset to make our company grow. The Group has the ambitious goal to position within the TOP 3 worldwide. We have been awarded Best Place to work in Spain for 4 consecutive years.




MLOps practices are both a strategic bet and a fast-growing initiative and thereby we are currently looking for a Data & Intelligence CoE LEADER. The position can be based in Spain Barcelona, even if the geographical scope is Europe. The desirable characteristics are:




What are we looking for?




We are seeking a ML Engineer to our team to take on the technical design and implementation in projects within the scope of our Data & Intelligence CoE, working in initiatives for top-tier organizations.




We are looking for a professional who brings his knowledge and experience in artificial intelligence focused on:




Defining and implementing technical solutions related to AI Platform framework/methodology.
Building AI Platforms aligned with the logical version defined in high-level architecture designs. Being a cloud-native, hybrid or on-premises environment.
Building CI/CD pipelines to orchestrate the MLOps life cycle aligned with client objectives and architecture requisites.
Contribute to the standardization of methodologies for development, training, deploying, inference and monitor of AI use cases.
Facing challenges related to MLOps practices, provide resources and tools for Data Scientist, give them flexibility for model development and robust methodology to allow its productivization, train models in an unattended way, monitorize the model performance and generate retrain alarms.




What will you be accountable for?




Your responsibilities around our artificial intelligence services will be focused on the following fields of action:




Project execution: ensuring the achievement of technical milestones in terms of effectiveness, efficiency and customer satisfaction. Identifying resources needed to do so while ensuring proper management of time, risk and quality.
Development of IaC scripts and pipelines to automate management and deployment of AI Platforms.
Development of CI/CD pipelines leveraging model development industrialization.
Development of custom software integrations to integrate external systems with the AI Platform.
Technical decision making.







Why would we want to meet you?




We want to meet you if:




You have 3 or more years of experience with AI-related projects.
You have experience working with IaC (CDK, Terraform, Ansible, etc.)
You have experience working with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, etc.)
You have strong coding skills in any of the most well-known Object-Oriented languages: Python, Java, C#, etc.
You have worked with artificial intelligence in a startup, large company or academic environment helping Data Scientist to deploy their work in production.
You are oriented to achieving high quality results and continuously improving.
You are committed to transmitting knowledge to the entire team.




We will positively value:




Experience with MLOps tools and frameworks, either from the Open-Source community or from a specific cloud provider.
Building CI/CD pipelines in the context of artificial intelligence.
Software design patterns knowledge.
Data Engineering skills and knowledge.
Experience with model and data monitoring.
IAM knowledge (users, groups, roles, permissions, etc.)




What do we offer?




We propose:




To work on projects for leading companies in Spanish and European market.
To be involved in high priority projects with visibility to senior leadership
To apply the latest technical innovations in artificial intelligence platforms in AWS.
To attend and give conferences.
To join the team of a consolidated multinational such as NTT Data, which shares with you its professional interests and enjoys applying artificial intelligence in large companies and public agencies.
A competitive salary according to provided experience.
A career path that ensures your professional development and continuous improvement (language courses, management and professional skill training, technical training and certifications).




If you are interested or would like to have more information, please apply via this advertisement.

Show more
HTML:
NTT DATA is the 6th biggest IT Service Company in the world with more than 100.000 professionals and a turnover of more than 15 billion euros.


We at NTT DATA Spain make the difference by being close to our clients, exceeding expectations, managing proactively our projects and customers and focusing on quality and selecting employees with the right mindset to make our company grow. The Group has the ambitious goal to position within the TOP 3 worldwide. We have been awarded Best Place to work in Spain for 4 consecutive years.


MLOps practices are both a strategic bet and a fast-growing initiative and thereby we are currently looking for a Data & Intelligence CoE LEADER. The position can be based in Spain Barcelona, even if the geographical scope is Europe. The desirable characteristics are:


What are we looking for?


We are seeking a ML Engineer to our team to take on the technical design and implementation in projects within the scope of our Data & Intelligence CoE, working in initiatives for top-tier organizations.


We are looking for a professional who brings his knowledge and experience in artificial intelligence focused on:


  • Defining and implementing technical solutions related to AI Platform framework/methodology.
  • Building AI Platforms aligned with the logical version defined in high-level architecture designs. Being a cloud-native, hybrid or on-premises environment.
  • Building CI/CD pipelines to orchestrate the MLOps life cycle aligned with client objectives and architecture requisites.
  • Contribute to the standardization of methodologies for development, training, deploying, inference and monitor of AI use cases.
  • Facing challenges related to MLOps practices, provide resources and tools for Data Scientist, give them flexibility for model development and robust methodology to allow its productivization, train models in an unattended way, monitorize the model performance and generate retrain alarms.


What will you be accountable for?


Your responsibilities around our artificial intelligence services will be focused on the following fields of action:


  • Project execution: ensuring the achievement of technical milestones in terms of effectiveness, efficiency and customer satisfaction. Identifying resources needed to do so while ensuring proper management of time, risk and quality.
  • Development of IaC scripts and pipelines to automate management and deployment of AI Platforms.
  • Development of CI/CD pipelines leveraging model development industrialization.
  • Development of custom software integrations to integrate external systems with the AI Platform.
  • Technical decision making.



Why would we want to meet you?


We want to meet you if:


  • You have 3 or more years of experience with AI-related projects.
  • You have experience working with IaC (CDK, Terraform, Ansible, etc.)
  • You have experience working with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, etc.)
  • You have strong coding skills in any of the most well-known Object-Oriented languages: Python, Java, C#, etc.
  • You have worked with artificial intelligence in a startup, large company or academic environment helping Data Scientist to deploy their work in production.
  • You are oriented to achieving high quality results and continuously improving.
  • You are committed to transmitting knowledge to the entire team.


We will positively value:


  • Experience with MLOps tools and frameworks, either from the Open-Source community or from a specific cloud provider.
  • Building CI/CD pipelines in the context of artificial intelligence.
  • Software design patterns knowledge.
  • Data Engineering skills and knowledge.
  • Experience with model and data monitoring.
  • IAM knowledge (users, groups, roles, permissions, etc.)


What do we offer?


We propose:


  • To work on projects for leading companies in Spanish and European market.
  • To be involved in high priority projects with visibility to senior leadership
  • To apply the latest technical innovations in artificial intelligence platforms in AWS.
  • To attend and give conferences.
  • To join the team of a consolidated multinational such as NTT Data, which shares with you its professional interests and enjoys applying artificial intelligence in large companies and public agencies.
  • A competitive salary according to provided experience.
  • A career path that ensures your professional development and continuous improvement (language courses, management and professional skill training, technical training and certifications).


If you are interested or would like to have more information, please apply via this advertisement.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist - AI/ML (Pharmaceuticals)

Hybrid - Spain

Responsibilities

Develop and implement NLP and Generative AI products using LLMs.
Identify key LLM/NLP use cases with stakeholders.
Support prioritization, assess feasibility, and make informed decisions to deliver patient benefits swiftly.
Collaborate with global agile teams to create high-value products for Roche Pharma and Diagnostics.
Provide guidance and hands-on support for analytical LLM/NLP use cases, evaluating different approaches and platforms.
Communicate findings and showcase use case value to stakeholders.




Qualifications

Proven experience deploying LLM models on AWS and Azure for scalable production.
Strong skills in training and optimizing language models for seamless integration.
Knowledge of best practices in code generation, documentation, data security, and compliance in cloud-based workflows.
Ability to deliver advanced analytical solutions and insights.
Proficient in data storytelling and using visualization tools for non-technical audiences.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
About The Digital GBUs

We are an innovative global healthcare company, driven by one purpose: we chase the miracles of science to improve peopleâ€™s lives. Our team, across some 100 countries, is dedicated to transforming the practice of medicine by working to turn the impossible into the possible. We provide potentially life-changing treatment options and life-saving vaccine protection to millions of people globally, while putting sustainability and social responsibility at the center of our ambitions.

Sanofiâ€™s Digital organizationâ€™s mission is to transform Sanofi into a data-first and AI first organization by empowering everyone with good data. Through custom developed AI products built on world class data foundations and platforms, the team builds value and a unique competitive advantage that scales across our markets, R&D and manufacturing sites. The team is located in major hubs in Paris, Lyon, Barcelona, Cambridge, Bridgewater and most recently, Toronto, with the aim of opening a new office in Budapest. Join a dynamic, fast paced and talented team, with world class mentorship, using AI to chase the miracle of science.

About Growing With Us

In this role you will develop globally scalable AI solutions that are strategically prioritized by the Sanofi commercial area across Global Business Units (General Medicine, Vaccines and Specialty Care) for the betterment of our global patients and customers. Examples of AI projects include, but are not limited to, Omnichannel Engagement, Predicting Next Best Action, Marketing Mix Model, Smart AI Alerts. You will specifically,


Apply data science expertise in machine learning, deep learning, statistics, text-mining/NLP, forecasting and optimization to multiple analytics projects
Build models, algorithms, simulations, and experiments by writing highly optimized code and using state-of-the art machine learning technologies
Work on full-spectrum of activities, from conducting ML experiments to delivering production-ready models
Use data analysis, visualization, storytelling, and data technologies to scope, define and deliver AI-based data products
Work closely with product owners, developers, engineers, and MLOps to deliver AI/ML solutions
Adhere to and promote to best practices and standards for data science process (including documentation) and code developments
Remains up to date with industry practices and emerging technologies such as generative AI and test creative ways of offering AI solutions to enhance existing solutions
Mentor and coach junior data scientists and interns


About You

Key Functional Requirements and qualifications:


Hands-on AI/ML modeling experience of complex datasets combined with strong understanding of theoretical foundations of AI/ML.
Expertise within most of the following areas: supervised learning, unsupervised learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning, federated learning, time series forecasting, Bayesian statistics, optimization
Experience developing deployable code and deploying models in product-focused development under an agile environment
Comfortable working in cloud and high-performance computing environments (e.g. AWS, GCP, Databricks, Apache Spark)
Experience in production-ready software development
Experience in leading the data science projects and working closely with junior data scientists and data analysts
Excellent written and verbal communication, business analysis, data visualization and data storytelling skills
Nice to have experience in life sciences and healthcare and experience in a complex global organization
A demonstrated ability to work and collaborate in a team environment
Ability to work in a fast-paced, constantly evolving environment and to manage multiple priorities
Fluent in English (Other languages a plus)


Key Technical requirements and qualifications:


PhD in computer science, mathematics, physics, statistics or a related quantitative discipline with strong coding skills, OR Masterâ€™s Degree in relevant domain with 6+ years of analytical experience
Expertise with core data science languages (such as Python, R, Scala), and experience working with different database systems (such as SQL, NoSQL)
Should have experience of AI/ML development (CI/CD, Orchestration)
Experience working in cloud-based environment such as AWS or GCP or Azure and using cloud-technologies for building AI-solutions
Knowledge of Tableau, Power BI, Plotly or similar
Experience with various enterprise-level Application Programming Interfaces (APIs)
Nice to have experience in using some data science tools such as datarobot, dataiku, Alteryx


When joining our team, you will experience:


An international work environment, in which you can develop your talent and realize ideas and innovations within a competent team
An attractive, market-oriented salary and cafeteria benefits
Flexible home office policy, with a possibility to work up to 60% of time from home / where you can easily schedule your office days
Work from an "Office of the Year 2020" finalist office
Collective life and accident insurance
Yearly medical check-up
Exposure to training and certification pathways for technical and functional skills from AWS, SnowFlake, Informatica and others
An individual and well-structured introduction and training of new employees and we will dedicate a Buddy for you to better navigate in your first weeks
Your own career path within Sanofi. Your professional and personal development will be supported purposefully


Pursue progress, discover extraordinary

Better is out there. Better medications, better outcomes, better science. But progress doesnâ€™t happen without people â€“ people from different backgrounds, in different locations, doing different roles, all united by one thing: a desire to make miracles happen. So, letâ€™s be those people.â€¯

â€¯

Pursue progress, discover extraordinary

Better is out there. Better medications, better outcomes, better science. But progress doesnâ€™t happen without people â€“ people from different backgrounds, in different locations, doing different roles, all united by one thing: a desire to make miracles happen. So, letâ€™s be those people.

At Sanofi, we provide equal opportunities to all regardless of race, colour, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, ability or gender identity.

Watch our ALL IN video and check out our Diversity Equity and Inclusion actions at sanofi.com!

Title: AI Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
As a trusted global transformation partner, Welocalize accelerates the global business journey by enabling brands and companies to reach, engage, and grow international audiences. Welocalize delivers multilingual content transformation services in translation, localization, and adaptation for over 250 languages with a growing network of over 400,000 in-country linguistic resources. Driving innovation in language services, Welocalize delivers high-quality training data transformation solutions for NLP-enabled machine learning by blending technology and human intelligence to collect, annotate, and evaluate all content types. Our team works across locations in North America, Europe, and Asia serving our global clients in the markets that matter to them. www.welocalize.com

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

MAIN PURPOSE OF ROLE

The Machine Learning Engineer role is responsible for the design, development, and implementation of data-driven solutions to serve our organization. This includes ownership or oversight of projects from conception to delivery with a focus on advanced analytics, statistical modeling, and data visualization. The role also includes responsibility for following best practices to optimize and measure the performance of our models and algorithms against business goals.

MAIN DUTIES


The following is a non-exhaustive list of responsibilities and areas of ownership of the Machine Learning Engineer:
Design and develop machine learning models and algorithms for various aspects of the localization and business workflow processes, including machine translation, LLM finetuning, and quality assurance
Take ownership of key projects from definition to delivery, ensuring that they meet technical requirements and maintain momentum and direction until delivery
Evaluate and select appropriate machine-learning techniques and algorithms to solve specific problems
Implement and optimize machine learning models and technologies using Python, TensorFlow, and other relevant tools and frameworks
Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results
Keep abreast of developments in the field, with a dedication to learning in the role
Document diligently and communicate thoughtfully about ML experimentation, design, and deployment
Define and design solutions to machine learning problems. Integration with larger systems done with guidance of more senior team members
Communicate with stakeholders and present findings in a clear manner
Propose solutions and strategies to tackle business challenges


Requirements


Education
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Machine Learning, Data Science or similar discipline (or equivalent experience)
Technical Skills and Experience
3+ years experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role
Highly proficient in Python
Excellent communication and documentation skills
Strong knowledge of machine learning techniques and algorithms, including supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and reinforcement learning
Hands-on, high proficiency experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn
Strong background and proven experience in natural language processing (NLP)
Analytical mind and business acumen
Experience with data visualization tools like matplotlib, bokeh, d3.js
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
Experience taking ownership of projects from conception to deployment, and mentoring more junior team members


Welocalize is committed to equal opportunities and in compliance with the General Law on the Rights of People with Disabilities, this vacancy is also available and we encourage those candidates who have a disability certificate (equal to or greater than 33%) to apply.
